channel.title: Team TreeHouse
channel.description:
I found this really cool website http://teamtreehouse.com/ it literally [b]spoon feeds[/b] you everything there is to know from website development, programming, IOS development, Android development and some stuff such as Ruby on Rails, Java, PHP etc.
It's more like a live course where there would be a video explaining everything from up most basic then a interactivity where you can apply the knowledge. No knowledge is needed what so ever to start with and I even found it useful. [b]Everything is in depth. [/b]
The only downside is that it's $25 a month. They also give job offers to some people too.
What do you guys think about Team TreeHouse? I think it's great and it would deffo help out a lot of people on Mopar (assuming they can afford they $25).

item.title: Team TreeHouse
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

marcbob:

Didn’t a bunch of big names in the industry start a website that is meant to teach programming to everyone for free? And I mean big names like Bill Gates and Mark Zuckerburg.

http://www.code.org/ ?

EDIT: In my experience in helping Oxi, sites like Code Academy doesn’t seem to really teach people the basics, just to follow a certain pattern.

Read full topic

item.title: Team TreeHouse
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I see no reason to pay for this when you can learn just as easily for free. [quote=“Arcik, post:5, topic:520259”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=638750.msg4305763#msg4305763 date=1369771898]
http://www.codecademy.com ?
[/quote]

code academy imo is crap and it doesn’t cover app development or web design etc?[/quote]Are you getting paid to advertise this? (Also I dont see why having ‘app development’ means it is ‘good’, it could be just as crap as codeacademy)

Read full topic

item.title: Team TreeHouse
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Loveandpower:

is this a monthly charge or what?

Yeah it’s a monthly charge but there’s nothing stopping you from downloading all the videos in 1 day and just watching them in you’re own time lol (if ya wana be a newb).

Bowser jr:

http://www.codecademy.com ?

code academy imo is crap and it doesn’t cover app development or web design etc?

Read full topic

I honestly wouldn’t use this to learn programming only because of the 25 dollars. If I remember correctly there was a GREAT website for such things… forgot what it was called though.
